author: bencos18
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Bank Loan cog. Use `[p]loan` to get started. If you need support, message me on Discord (bencos18) or open a GitHub issue.
short: A bank loan system for Redbot.
description: A cog that provides a bank loan system for Redbot, allowing users to take out and repay loans.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user loan data for the purpose of tracking outstanding loans and repayments. All data is stored using Red's Config system and is not shared with third parties.
